src:
GOT7, Boyband 'Lintas Negara' yang Gemar Bereksperimen
05 Nov 2019, 21:02 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Boyband GOT7 memiliki member yang datang dari berbagai negara. (dok. JYP Entertainment)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- GOT7 kembali melalui 'Call My Name', mini album ke-10 yang dirilis sejak debut pada 2014. GOT7 merupakan boyband asuhan JYP Entertainment yang beranggotakan JB, Mark, Jinyoung, Jackson, Youngjae, Bambam dan Yugyeom.Member GOT7 berasal dari berbagai negara. JB, Jinyoung, Youngjae dan Yugyeom berasal dari Korea. Sementara Mark berasal dari Amerika Serikat, Jackson dari Hong Kong dan Bambam dari Thailand.Sebelum debut bersama GOT7, JB dan Jinyoung telah lebih dulu debut dalam JJ Project dan menjadi aktor dalam drama 'Dream High' (2012) serta 'When a Man Falls in Love' (2013).Sementara, Jackson adalah atlet fencing nasional Hong Kong yang akhirnya memilih menjadi idol dan debut dalam GOT7. Bersama Mark, BamBam dan Yugyeom, Jackson menyiapkan debut bersama dan tampil dalam survival show Who is Next: WIN.Youngjae menjadi member yang terakhir bergabung dan debut setelah menjalani pelatihan tujuh bulan, paling singkat dibandingkan member lainnya.GOT7 debut pada 2014 melalui 'Girls Girls Girls'. Awalnya, CEO JYP Entertainment Park Jinyoung menyiapkan GOT7 sebagai grup hip hop. Dalam video musik debut, para member terutama Mark dan Jackson melakukan martial arts, JB pun menunjukkan kemampuan b-boying.



Kala itu, mereka dibandingkan dengan pendahulunya, 2PM, yang kerap menonjolkan tarian akrobatik dalam koreografi. GOT7 merupakan boyband pertama yang debut dalam JYP setelah 2PM pada 2008.Konsep hip hop tersebut masih dibawa hingga mini album kedua, 'Got Love', yang memiliki lagu utama bertajuk 'A'. Kendati demikian, lagu tersebut jauh lebih berwarna dan ceria dibandingkan Girls Girls Girls.


Awalnya, GOT7 dibentuk dengan konsep hip hop. (dok. JYP Entertainment)

Penampilan GOT7 berubah 180 derajat pada 2015 ketika merilis 'Just Right' dengan nuansa warna warni, menyertai musik yang ceria dan ringan dibandingkan seluruh pendahulunya. Di tahun yang sama, mereka kembali dengan konsep 'gelap' melalui 'If You Do'.Konsep kembali berubah saat merilis 'Confession Song' dalam mini album 'Mad: Winter Edition', jadi ceria dan lembut.GOT7 mulai merilis album dengan teori yang saling berkelanjutan sejak 2016. Dimulai dari 'Flight Log: Departure' dengan 'Fly' sebagai lagu utama, di mana mereka menjadi grup Korea pertama yang masuk Top 100 Artist Billboard setelah Psy.Flight Log: Departure berlanjut ke 'Flight Log: Turbulence' (2016) dengan 'Hard Carry' sebagai lagu utama. Teori album tersebut diteruskan pada 'Flight Log: Arrival' (2017) yang memiliki 'Never Ever' menjadi lagu utama.Pada 2017, GOT7 kembali mencoba ragam genre. Setelah lagu bertempo cepat dalam Never Ever, mereka mencoba genre lain melalui lagu 'You Are' yang serta dalam mini album '7 for 7', juga lagu 'Teenager' yang menjadi b-side album yang sama.Tak hanya di Korea, GOT7 juga aktif di Jepang sejak 2015. Lagu-lagu yang dirilis berbeda dengan versi Korea. Lagu Jepang GOT7 terdengar lebih kental nada rock dengan beat ala Jepang.Namun, GOT7 harus beraktivitas dan promosi di Jepang tanpa Jackson sejak 2017. Hal itu bermula karena permasalahan kesehatan dan penyesuaian jadwal. Oleh sebab itu, Jackson memutuskan untuk tidak memperpanjang kontrak dengan Sony Music Entertainment Jepang.Dengan enam anggota, GOT7 merilis beberapa mini album seperti 'I Won't Let You Go' yang langsung menyapu bersih tangga lagu Oricon serta 'Love Loop' yang dirilis pertengahan 2019 lalu.


GOT7 diketahui kerap mencoba berbagai ragam konsep. (dok. JYP Entertainment)

Pada 2019, JYP Entertainment membuat sub-unit baru dari GOT7 yakni Jus2 yang beranggotakan sang leader dan maknae (member termuda), JB dan Yugyeom. Mereka merilis mini album dengan 'Focus on Me' sebagai lagu utama.Terbaru, GOT7 merilis 'Call My Name'. Jinyoung mengatakan mereka terlihat lebih seksi dengan musik yang lebih sederhana dan minimalis dalam mini album tersebut. Meski genre musik berubah lagi, ia memastikan mereka masih berpegang pada fondasi yang tak berubah, yakni ahgase (IGOT7), sebutan bagi penggemar.Dalam video musik You Calling My Name, GOT7 menaruh banyak warna hijau neon yang menjadi warna identitas ahgase. Sementara dalam video musik Love Loop, mereka menaruh seekor burung terbang yang juga merepresentasikan ahgase, yang berarti bayi burung.Demikian pula dengan lagu 'Miracle'. Lagu itu berkisah tentang gadis kecil, seorang ahgase, yang sakit dan berharap bertemu GOT7 setidaknya satu kali selama hidup. Harapan itu disampaikan kepada kakaknya yang kemudian diteruskan kepada orang tua.Gadis tersebut akhirnya mendapatkan tiket fan meeting untuk bertemu sang idola. Namun sayang, ia meninggal dunia sebelum berjumpa dengan GOT7. Sang kakak lantas mencuitkan hal tersebut dan menyebut akun Mark di Twitter.



Kisah itu akhirnya sampai kepada GOT7, hingga Miracle lahir sebagai hadiah dan pengingat atas kehadiran ahgase kecil bernama Cherry tersebut.Sejak debut, GOT7 telah meraih beragam penghargaan seperti Artist of the Year dan Best Popular Award Asia Artist Awards 2018, Album of the Year (kuartal pertama) Gaon Chart Music Awards 2017, dan Best New Artis Golden Disc Awards 2015. (chri/rea)
text:
GOT7, 'Cross Country' Boyband Who Likes to Experiment
05 Nov 2019, 21:02 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Boyband GOT7 has members who come from various countries. (doc. JYP Entertainment)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - GOT7 returned through 'Call My Name', the 10th mini album released since its debut in 2014. GOT7 is a JYP Entertainment boy band consisting of JB, Mark, Jinyoung, Jackson, Youngjae, Bambam and Yugyeom.Member GOT7 comes from various countries. JB, Jinyoung, Youngjae and Yugyeom are from Korea. While Mark is from the United States, Jackson from Hong Kong and Bambam from Thailand. Before debuting with GOT7, JB and Jinyoung debuted on the JJ Project and became actors in the drama 'Dream High' (2012) and 'When a Man Falls in Love '(2013). Meanwhile, Jackson is a Hong Kong national fencing athlete who finally chose to become an idol and debut in GOT7. Together with Mark, BamBam and Yugyeom, Jackson prepared a debut together and appeared in the survival show Who is Next: WIN. Youngjae became the last member to join and debut after undergoing training for seven months, the shortest compared to other members. GOT7 debuted in 2014 through 'Girls Girls Girls'. Initially, JYP Entertainment CEO Park Jinyoung prepared GOT7 as a hip hop group. In the debut music video, the members especially Mark and Jackson do martial arts, JB also shows b-boying abilities.



At that time, they were compared to their predecessor, 2PM, who often featured acrobatic dances in choreography. GOT7 was the first boy band to debut in JYP after 2PM in 2008. The hip hop concept was still carried over to the second mini album, 'Got Love', which has the main song titled 'A'. Nevertheless, the song is much more colorful and cheerful than Girls Girls Girls.


Initially, GOT7 was formed with the concept of hip hop. (doc. JYP Entertainment)

GOT7's appearance changed 180 degrees in 2015 when it released 'Just Right' with colorful shades, accompanying cheerful and light music compared to all of its predecessors. In the same year, they returned with the concept of 'dark' through 'If You Do'. The concept changed again when releasing 'Confession Song' in the mini album 'Mad: Winter Edition', so cheerful and gentle. GOT7 began releasing albums with theories that mutual continuity since 2016. Starting from 'Flight Log: Departure' with 'Fly' as the main song, where they became the first Korean group to enter the Top 100 Artist Billboard after Psy. Light Log: Departure continues to 'Flight Log: Turbulence' ( 2016) with 'Hard Carry' as the main song. The theory of the album continued on 'Flight Log: Arrival' (2017) which has 'Never Ever' became the main song. In 2017, GOT7 tried again various genres. After the fast tempo song in Never Ever, they tried other genres through the song 'You Are' which was included in the mini album '7 for 7', also the song 'Teenager' which became the same b-side album. Not only in Korea, GOT7 also active in Japan since 2015. The songs released are different from the Korean version. The Japanese song GOT7 sounds more thick rock tones with Japanese-style beats. However, GOT7 has to do activities and promotions in Japan without Jackson since 2017. It started because of health problems and schedule adjustments. Therefore, Jackson decided not to renew his contract with Sony Music Entertainment Japan. With six members, GOT7 released several mini albums such as 'I Won't Let You Go' which immediately wiped out the Oricon charts and 'Love Loop' which was released mid 2019 ago.


GOT7 is known to often try a variety of concepts. (doc. JYP Entertainment)

In 2019, JYP Entertainment created a new sub-unit of GOT7 namely Jus2 consisting of the leader and maknae (the youngest member), JB and Yugyeom. They released a mini album with 'Focus on Me' as the main song. Recently, GOT7 released 'Call My Name'. Jinyoung said they look sexier with simpler and minimalist music in the mini album. Even though the music genre has changed again, he made sure they still adhere to the unchanging foundation, namely ahgase (IGOT7), the name for fans. In the music video You Calling My Name, GOT7 put a lot of neon green color into the color of ahgase identity. While in the Love Loop music video, they put a flying bird that also represents ahgase, which means baby bird. Likewise, the song 'Miracle'. The song is about a little girl, an ahgase, who is sick and hopes to meet GOT7 at least once in her life. That hope was conveyed to her sister who then passed on to her parents. The girl finally got a fan meeting ticket to meet the idol. But unfortunately, he died before meeting with GOT7. The brother then tweeted it and called Mark's account on Twitter.



The story finally arrived at GOT7, until Miracle was born as a gift and reminder of the presence of a small ahgase named Cherry. Since its debut, GOT7 has won various awards such as Artist of the Year and 2018 Asia's Popular Popular Award, Album of the Year (quarter first) Gaon Chart Music Awards 2017, and Best New Artist Golden Disc Awards 2015. (chri / rea)
